pageContent: Introduction: Recovery of baseline erectile function (EF) after robotic radical prostatectomy in men with high-risk prostate cancer is under-reported. Published studies have selectively reported on low-risk disease using non-validated and poorly defined thresholds for EF recovery.

metaData.source:
[Nerve-sparing open radical prostatectomy with extracapsular dissection]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20123515/
